info.title: Auto-generated OAS of Lin-CMS using OOPS

200.description: Book object or null if not found

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the book to delete

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the book to retrieve

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of books to return per page (max 15)

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search term for filtering books by title

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of items per page (0 < count < 16). Default is 5.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Keyword to search in log message.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: 验证码标记码，用于验证码校验

400.description: Failed - 验证码校验失败 or other parameter errors

200.description: 查询所有可分配的权限成功

module.description: 权限所属模块，例如：人员管理

401.description: 认证失败，未提供有效token或token过期

403.description: 权限不足，需要管理员权限

400.description: 参数错误，如密码验证失败

parameters.description: 更新用户信息的请求体
